name: Tenant's responsibility to inform landlord
text: [§521-55]  Tenant's responsibility to inform landlord.  Any defective condition of the premises which comes to the tenant's attention, which the tenant has reason to believe is unknown to the landlord, and which the tenant has reason to believe is the duty of the landlord or of another tenant to repair, shall be reported by the tenant to the landlord as soon as practicable. [L 1972, c 132, pt of §1; gen ch 1985]
